name: Gourd Getaway
description:
GOURD GETAWAY

Gourd Getaway is a rolling 3D platformmer made for the 2020 Jam-O-Lantern.

Play as a daring pumpkin as it rolls out of it's home patch and through 8 physics based programming levels.

Collect candy to unlock the cannon and blast away to the next world!

Includes:

  • 8 levels
  • 3 pumpkin sizes
  • An ending cutscene
  • A lot of candy corn
  • Even more candy
  • 3 Layered Music Tracks
  • A good amount of bugs (it was made in a week after all)

Credits:

  • Elijah Cobb - Programmer and Level Designer
  • Ben Lipkin - Composer
  • Kiki Weerasiri - Sound Designer
  • Michelle Lugo - Composer
  • Eric - Composer
  • Gem - 3D Art

Thank you to the Jam-O-Lantern organizers for making this possible!
